events: Lost their sibling Hughekine when Herardus was 9 and Hughekine was 3.
Lost their sibling Folqui when Herardus was 13 and Folqui was 12.
Lost their sibling Conrad when Herardus was 15 and Conrad was 6.
Lost mother at the age of 18
Lost wife Gheesen when she gave birth to Ghodekin.
Lost their child Pieter when Pieter was 3 years old.
